author: kahatlen
msg: DERBY-6624: Use javax.xml.xpath interfaces for XPath support
Stop using the interfaces in the org.w3c.dom.xpath package, since they
are not part of the Java SE specification.

author: rombert
msg: SLING-3620 - POM preparations for release
Force the qualifier to be 'RELEASE' in preparation for the 1.0.0 release
vote.

author: rombert
msg: SLING-3620 - POM preparations for release
Bump the version to 1.0.0

author: stsp
msg: In the FSFS commit code, explicitly pass changed paths data between
functions to make it more obvious how and where the data is used,
and rename some variables for clarity. No functional change.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_fs/transaction.c
(verify_locks): Add 'changed_paths' parameter, replacing the local
'changes' variable, and stop fetching the list of changed paths
in the transaction from within this function. Rename the existing
'changed_paths' local variable to 'changed_paths_sorted'.
(commit_body): Fetch changed paths before calling verify_locks()
and pass changed paths to verify_locks() explicitly.

author: rombert
msg: SLING-3620 - POM preparations for release
Use the '0.0.0' version in category.xml, to make it independent of the
actual version of the project.
